meaningMnemonic: When your <radical>ear</radical> is <radical>cross</radical>ed with sound, it catches it like a <radical>net</radical>, and sends it to your <radical>heart</radical> for processing. Because you're using your heart to process this sound, it means you're giving it a proper <kanji>listen</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You are <kanji>listen</kanji>ing so well to what someone is saying. What are they telling you that is so important? They are telling you of the omen of Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (ちょう), who will destroy the earth.
